settings.page.title: Settings
settings.account.username.title: Username
settings.account.username.tips: Email you can use to sign in to your account.
settings.account.username.button.label: Change email
settings.account.password.title: Password
settings.account.password.tips: It's recommended to change your password regularly, or sooner if you suspect any issues.
settings.account.password.button.label: Change password
settings.account.password.form.email.con: Please enter the new password again
settings.account.password.form.email.pas: Password should be at least 10 characters
settings.account.2fa.title: Two-factor authentication
settings.appearance.theme.title: Theme
settings.appearance.theme.form.value.ext: Reload the page for the change to take effect.
settings.appearance.language.title: Language
Reload the page for the change to take effect.
settings.sslprovider.ca.title: System-wide CA
settings.sslprovider.ca.tips:
You can set different CAs for each workflow as well.
The certificate validity lifetime, certificate algorithm, domain names count, and support for wildcard domain names are allowed may vary among different providers. After switching service providers, please check whether the configuration of the workflows needs to be adjusted.
settings.sslprovider.form.provider.label: ACME CA provider
settings.sslprovider.form.letsencryptsta:
The staging environment can reduce the chance of your running up against rate limits.

Learn more:
https://letsencrypt.org/docs/staging-environment/
settings.persistence.title: Data retention
settings.persistence.form.workflow_runs_: Max days retention of workflow history runs
Please enter the maximum retention days of workflow history runs
Set to 0 to disable cleanup workflow history runs. It is recommended to set it to 180 days or more.
settings.persistence.form.expired_certif: Max days retention of expired certificates
Please enter the maximum retention days of expired certificates
Set to <b>0</emb> to disable cleanup expired certificates.
